Title: When the Saints Go Marching In
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Jeffrey Lieber (teleplay by), Julie Plec (story by), Kyle Arrington (story editor), Beau DeMayo (story editor), K.C. Perry (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Intent on saving Hope's life, Klaus' plan will change the lives of the Mikaelson family forever.
